text: You may prove anything by figures.
You cannot feed the hungry on statistics.
Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are more pliable.
Statistics are figures used as arguments.
Figures won't lie, but liars will figure.
source: Unknown (though often misattributed to Mark Twain)

text: Models are to be used, but not to be believed.
All models are wrong, but some are useful.
We are drowning in information and starving for knowledge.
When noise is correlated it becomes music.
Statistics state the status of the state.
